channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The 35 best movies of 2025: TechRadar's favorite films on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max, and more
item.description: It's been another year of top-tier movies, and TechRadar's experts have rounded up their favorites of the last 12 months.

item.title: Stream this MGM+ show after Robin Hood episode 10 — I promise you won't regret it
item.description: Robin Hood episode 10 means the series is sadly over — but there's another irresistible MGM+ show you need to stream next.

item.title: From D-shaped bots to apps with a big 'Just clean it' button – these are the robot vacuum upgrades I want to see in 2026
item.description: Robovacs have come a long way in the decade I've been testing them for... but there's still room for improvement.

item.title: How to win January – 7 inspiring ways to upgrade your life with tech in 2026
item.description: Looking to upgrade your life with tech in 2026? Here's how the TechRadar team are doing it –and how you can do the same.

item.title: The launch of the Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 Pro seems to be imminent, based on the latest leak
item.description: With regulatory approval now granted to Samsung's next flagship earbuds, a launch must be close.

item.title: How Much Melatonin Should You Be Taking? (2026)
item.description: Many people rely on the sleep aid melatonin to help them get a more restful night’s sleep. But is it safe? And how much is too much?

item.title: Test TCL Z100 : des enceintes home cinéma ou indépendantes simples, modulables et vraiment immersives
item.description: TCL promet de bousculer le home cinéma sans fil avec ses enceintes Z100, disponible à l’unité et jusqu’à quatre modules compacts pensés pour l’Atmos et taillés pour s’adapter à n’importe quel salon. Reste à voir si cette solution modulaire, conçue pour les TV de la marque, mais aussi utilisables indépendamment, tient vraiment la comparaison avec les barres de son haut de gamme du marché. ...

item.title: The best PS5 games from 2025
item.description: In this new era of console… inclusivity? driven by Sony and mostly Microsoft bringing their exclusives to other platforms, it's getting harder to highlight games that make a singular console shine. Indeed, the top-performing games year after year on both PlayStation and Xbox are multiplatform releases, and often the best games of the year, like […]

item.title: Apple Macs in 2025: the best and worst moments of the year
item.description: How did the Mac do in 2025? We look back on Apple’s past year of computing – both good and bad.

item.title: I finally fixed my home audio setup using a roomEQ kit – here's how you can too
item.description: Want to really hear what your home audio setup can do in 2026? I tried using a room correction kit, here were the results.

item.title: Screaming Wi-Fi, internet dresses and unhinged AI chatbots - 20 of the wackiest tech stories we saw in 2025
item.description: From fungal batteries to a dress made out of the internet, these wacky 2025 stories show just how strange modern tech can be.

item.title: The same engine powering supersonic flight wants to power AI
item.description: AI is turning to supersonic jet engines to power its sprawling data centers.

item.title: Comment installer des jeux sur la carte microSD de sa ROG Xbox Ally ?
item.description: La ROG Xbox Ally est pensée pour accueillir un maximum de jeux, mais puisque la console peut faire tourner des jeux bien gourmands, son SSD interne peut vite se retrouver saturé. Heureusement, la console gère parfaitement les cartes microSD. Alors voici comment installer vos jeux directement dessus, sans prise de tête.

item.title: La puissance et l’élégance du MacBook Air M4 perdent 200 euros chez Amazon
item.description: Le MacBook Air M4 ne marque pas une révolution chez Apple et vient se placer dans la continuité de la version sous M3. Chez Amazon, il perd 16 % de son prix et chute à 1 139 euros.

item.title: 10 Best Drones (2025): Flight-Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you want to battle Star Wars spaceships or shoot a cinematic masterpiece, one of these drones is going to be perfect for you.
